validating-string-parameter.title: Validating String Parameter Plugin

vboxwrapper.excerpt: Plugin provides a build wrapper for starting and stopping slaves on the virtual machine
vboxwrapper.name: vboxwrapper
vboxwrapper.title: VBoxWrapper

versioncolumn.excerpt: This plugin shows the version of slave on "Manage Nodes" page and make the node offline if it uses old slave.jar.
versioncolumn.name: versioncolumn
versioncolumn.title: VersionColumn Plugin

versionnumber.excerpt: This plugin creates a new version number and stores it in the environment variable whose name you specify in the configuration.
versionnumber.name: versionnumber
versionnumber.title: Version Number Plugin

view-job-filters.excerpt: Create smart views with exactly the jobs you want.  Your smart views can automatically include or exclude jobs by using things like the SCM path or type, the job type, build statuses or trends or triggers, relevance to the logged-in user, email recipients, Maven configuration, job parameterization, and user permissions. Mix and match filters to narrow down to exactly what you want.
view-job-filters.name: view-job-filters
view-job-filters.title: View Job Filters

viewVC.excerpt: This plugin integrates ViewVC browser interface for CVS and Subversion with Hudson.
viewVC.name: viewVC
viewVC.title: ViewVC Plugin

violations.excerpt: This plug-in generates reports static code violation detectors such as checkstyle, pmd, cpd, findbugs, codenarc, fxcop, stylecop and simian.
violations.name: violations
violations.title: Violations

virtualbox.excerpt: This plugin integrates Jenkins with VirtualBox (version 3, 4.0, 4.1 and 4.2) virtual machine.
virtualbox.name: virtualbox
virtualbox.title: VirtualBox Plugin

vmware.excerpt: This plugin allows you to start a VMware Virtual Machine before a build and stop it again after the build completes.

whitesource.excerpt: The plugin brings automatic open source management to Jenkins users.

xvnc.title: Xvnc Plugin

zentimestamp.excerpt: This plugin makes it possible to change the Jenkins build timestamp format (provided by the Jenkins BUILD_ID variable).

zentimestamp.title: ZenTimestamp Plugin
